universe_map_fetch_error_description: Error fetching map data! Please try again later.
intel_picture_fetch_error_description: Error fetching intel data! Please try again later.
login_error_invalid_username_or_password: Unable to sign in using the provided credentials.
login_error_generic: Unable to sign in at this time. Try again later.
register_error_password_uppercase: Must contain at least 1 upper case charcter.
register_error_password_special: Must contain at least 1 special character
register_error_password_lowercase: Must contain at least 1 lower case character.
register_error_password_short: Must be at least 6 characters long.
register_error_generic: Unable to register at this time. Try again later.
invite_link_description: Users can use this link to register for WIMP.
intel_reporting_setup_0: This page will help you set up intel reporting. WIMP will work best if at least one person is reporting intel at any given time.
intel_reporting_1_1: In order to prevent unauthorized actors from sending false intel, submitting reports require an API key. This API key is tied to your account and should not be shared with anyone.
intel_reporting_1_2: Press the button below to generate an API key:
intel_reporting_2_1: WIMP-Intellog is a standalone application constantly monitoring and parsing EVE intel channel chat logs. Once any message is discovered the message contents will be sent to the WIMP server for processing.
intel_reporting_2_2: Visit the WIMP-Intellog download page and download "WIMP-IntelLog.exe":
intel_reporting_2_3: The application consists of a standalone executable file and can be placed anywhere on your computer.
intel_reporting_3_1: WIMP-Intellog relies on a configuration file for configuration. The section below will help you generate the necessary configuration.
intel_reporting_3_2: Use the text field to select where the EVE chat log directory is located. On most systems the default path specified below will be sufficient.
intel_reporting_3_3: Use the file input to select which intel log files to observe. The selected filenames will be added to the generated configuration. Skip this step if "WOMP intel" and "INTEL.RC" is sufficient.
intel_reporting_3_4: Copy the generated configuration below and save in a file called "Config.json" next to "WIMP-Intellog.exe" file downloaded earlier.
intel_reporting_4_1: Double click the "WIMP-Intellog.exe" file to run the application. Watch the output for any errors and come back to this guide if any errors is reported.
